data.text: @GaDPH When you are around immunocompromised or otherwise vulnerable people, you should wear a mask. Since vulnerable people are part of society and therefore everywhere, while there is a pandemic going on, you should wear a mask.
@GaDPH Why not just go a step further to reduce spread by recommending masks in public for all?

@GaDPH To avoid direct contact that spreads new variant, use free app Bost instead to communicate with people at the same place. Download for free at Apple https://t.co/uChWynVbJG & Google https://t.co/Nvi0yitq3f https://t.co/t1jIuXtwoa
